content: this legal text is about a case involving an inheritance dispute the plaintiff referred to as actress e is one of the coheirs and claims their rights to a portion of the inheritance the defendant referred to as convened e is another coheir and objects to the claim arguing that the plaintiff does not have standing to make the claim the case has reached the stage of presenting factual statements during a hearing held on september 27 2013 the court examines the evidence including a notarial deed from 2006 and determines that the transfer of the property violated the right of preemption granted to the coheirs as a result the court concludes that the plaintiff has the right to redeem their share of the property and orders the defendant to reimburse them for the amount paid for the transfer plus legal interest the court also awards costs of the litigation to the plaintiff
